games.name: Payday 3
games.guide:
How to install a Payday 3 mod

Step 1: Find where your Payday 3 game is installed and go to {Location}/PAYDAY3/Content/Paks/ .

Step 2: Create the "~mods" folder

Step 3: Open the launcher where you own the game and go to the launch options:

  • On Steam: Open the Payday 3 page, click the settings button, then Properties, and finally General (if Steam doesn’t take you there by default).
  • On Epic Games Store: Find the Payday 3 tile, right‑click it, and click "Manage"; the option will be at the bottom of the settings window.

Step 4: Enter "-fileopenlog" in the launch options.

And there you go, your game is ready to be modded! Just put your mods in the "~mods" folder you created earlier and launch the game.

mods.title: Phone Wallpaper - Sinder Succubus
mods.shortdescription: This mod uses Hioyami’s succubus fanart as the phone wallpaper.
mods.description: This mod uses Hioyami’s succubus fanart as the phone wallpaper.

mods.title: Art Gallery (mission "Under the Surphaze") - Sinder
mods.shortdescription: This mod replaces the paintings found in the mission "Under the Surphaze" with various Sinder fanarts.
mods.description: This mod replaces the paintings found in the mission "Under the Surphaze" with various Sinder fanarts.

mods.title: Gamersupps Vending Machine - Sinder
mods.shortdescription: This mod replaces vending machine ads with a texture promoting Sinder Pyro Power’s Gamersupps.
mods.description: This mod replaces vending machine ads with a texture promoting Sinder Pyro Power’s Gamersupps.

mods.title: F1 Team Gamersupps Pyro Pup Industries
mods.shortdescription: This mod replaces the Oracle Red Bull Racing team with a fictional, Sinder‑themed team.
mods.description:
This mod replaces the Oracle Red Bull Racing team with a fictional, Sinder‑themed team.

The drivers are replaced as follows:
Max Verstappen -> Sinder (renamed "Sinder PUP")
Sergio Checo Pérez -> Trickywi (renamed "Trickywi Nouvelle NEPHASIS")
Yuki Tsunoda -> Yuzu Sanagi
Daniel Ricciardo -> Vienna (renamed "Vienna Noodle")

And the teams as follow:
Oracle Red Bull Racing -> Gamersupps Pyro Pup Industries Formula 1 Team
Visa Cashapp RB F1 Team ->

mods.title: Phone Wallpaper - GX Aura
mods.shortdescription: This mod uses Roko’s Baka Mitai fanart as the phone wallpaper.
mods.description: This mod uses Roko’s Baka Mitai fanart as the phone wallpaper.

mods.title: Van Livery - GX Aura
mods.shortdescription: This mod transforms Payday 3’s van into a design based on the streamer GX Aura.
mods.description: This mod transforms Payday 3’s van into a design based on the streamer GX Aura.

mods.title: Renault T Truck Livery - GX Aura
mods.shortdescription: This mod transforms the Renault T into a design based on the streamer GX Aura.
mods.description: This mod transforms the Renault T into a design based on the streamer GX Aura.

mods.title: Trailer Livery - GX Aura
mods.shortdescription: This mod applies a design based on the streamer GX Aura to the standard trailers.
mods.description:
This mod applies a design based on the streamer GX Aura to the standard trailers.
The affected trailers are: insulated, dry, curtain‑sided, refrigerated
